Title: Clean Skin
Writer: Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Chip Johannessen
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Morena Baccarin, David Harewood
Plot: Nicholas Brody quickly proves himself a welcome father for already doting son Chris and even brat Dana, who for his sake swallows her objections to a "hero's perfect family" TV show, ...
